history.narrative: Law 4-80 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-292, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 24, 1981, and December 8, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 21, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-134 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
